DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: Machine_Tool Orders Up 17.4 % in June : Orders also jumped 20 % for the first_half of 1994 from the same period a year ago , an industry trade group said . The Assn . for Manufacturing Technology announced that June orders for U.S.-made machine_tools totaled $ 379.2 million , compared to $ 322.9 million in May and $ 313.7 million in June , 1993.Orders for the first six months of 1994 totaled $ 2.12 billion , an increase from $ 1.77 billion for the first_half of 1993 , the group said . " Late last year , most forecasters were predicting a relatively flat order rate for the first six months of ' 94 , " said Albert W . Moore , president of the McLean , Va.-based association . " In light of this , the 20 % increase year-on-year through June is welcome news. "
